articles.title: Elon Musk frets over controlling Tesla’s ‘robot army’ as car biz rebounds slightly
articles.description: Tesla's profit actually fell 37% compared to the same period last year, despite buyers rushing to take advantage of the expiring EV tax credit.
articles.author: Sean O'Kane

articles.title: Snapchat makes its first open prompt AI Lens available for free in the US
articles.description: Snapchat is expanding access to its AI-powered “Imagine Lens,” allowing all users to generate and edit images with custom prompts for free.
articles.author: Sarah Perez

articles.title: Why Cohere’s ex-AI research lead is betting against the scaling race
articles.description: Cohere's former VP of AI research, Sara Hooker, is launching a new startup to build AI models that can adapt to their environment.
articles.author: Maxwell Zeff

articles.author: Rebecca Bellan

articles.title: OpenAI’s Atlas is more about ChatGPT than the web
articles.description: OpenAI's new browser is a surface for the company to distribute ChatGPT and develop new AI features rather than improving core web experience.
articles.author: Ivan Mehta

articles.author: Aisha Malik

articles.title: Amazon will buy thousands of pedal-assist cargo vehicles from Rivian spinoff Also
articles.description: The pedal-assist cargo quad vehicles are narrow delivery vans that can operate in a bike lane.

articles.author: Theresa Loconsolo

articles.title: What’s Updog? Datadog’s new tool tells you which apps are down
articles.description: Cloud monitoring platform Datadog launched Updog, a web dashboard that shows the live health status of various SaaS APIs.
articles.author: Amanda Silberling

articles.title: Rivian spinoff Also reveals a high-end modular e-bike for $4,500
articles.description: The first in a lineup of new vehicles from Also, which started as a skunkworks project inside of Rivian a few years ago.

articles.description: Apple has pulled the controversial dating safety apps Tea and TeaOnHer from the App Store over violations of its content moderation and privacy

articles.title: Instagram rolls out custom icons … but only for teens

articles.title: Tinder will require new users in the US to verify their identity with a selfie
articles.description: The facial-verification feature, known as Face Check, requires new users to verify their identity by submitting a short video selfie.
articles.author: Lauren Forristal

articles.title: GM is bringing Google Gemini-powered AI assistant to cars in 2026
articles.description: GM is the latest automaker to lean into generative AI-based assistants that promise to respond to driver requests in a more natural-sounding way.

articles.title: Meta cuts 600 AI jobs amid ongoing reorganization
articles.description: Meta continues to restructure its AI efforts after poaching more than 50 researchers from competing labs this summer.
articles.author: Amanda Silberling

articles.author: Sarah Perez

articles.title: GM’s under-the-hood overhaul puts AI and automated driving at the center
articles.description: The U.S. automaker's technological overhaul will debut in two years with the Cadillac Escalade IQ.

articles.title: Samsung takes on Apple’s Vision Pro with new Galaxy XR headset
articles.description: Galaxy XR costs $1,800, nearly half the price of the Vision Pro.
